author: Josiah Wilmoth
title: Ben Sasse Epically Trolls China Over Suspicious Coronavirus Data
description: Ben Sasse epically trolled China over China's suspicious coronavirus data. Quite frankly, it's a refreshing dose of reality. The post Ben Sasse Epically Trolls China Over Suspicious Coronavirus Data appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• U.S. Senator Ben Sasse delivered an epic rebuke to Chinas government, which claims Wuhan hasnt seen a new coronavirus infection in six days.
  • Theres mounting evidence that China has pressured hospitals to stop conducting coronavirus tests.
